skins.shipDescription: Chao Ho-class protected cruiser ¨C Ying Swei.
skins.selfIntroduction: I am the second ship of the Chao Ho-class protected cruisers, Ying Swei. I'm also Chao Ho's sister. By the way, if you see the two of us bickering, don't be alarmed. It's nothing more than our way of expressing affection for one another. Hehe~?
skins.acquisition: It is a pleasure to meet you, Commander. I am the elder of the Chao Ho sisters, Ying Swei. Hmm, Chao Ho said that she's the big sister? Hmm, I guess you're not as gullible as she is. Hehe~?
skins.login: The ever-industrious commander, right on time today. Hey... have you seriously never thought about playing hooky?
skins.details: Going by launch date, one could say that I am actually Chao Ho's older sister... But alas, since she wants that role so badly, she can have it. Besides, being the "little sister" comes with perks of its own. Hehe~?
skins.secretaryIdle1: Chao Ho, if you want to be seen as the big sister, you're going to have to do things yourself instead of relying on the commander. Heehee~?
skins.secretaryIdle2: Reminder from Ying Swei~ You've had your head in the clouds for a while~
skins.secretaryIdle3: Are you interested in the Four Treasures of the Study? I'd be glad to instruct you. Hehe, not to boast, but I'm quite confident in my abilities.
skins.secretaryTouch: If you're tired, you should go ahead and rest. Collapsing due to overwork is inefficient.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Wouldn't it be a great time for me to tell everyone how much of a pervert you are? If you want me to reconsider, you'll have to make me a little promise first. Hehe~
skins.secretaryHeadpat: If you mess up my hair, I'll have you style it for me for a week starting tomorrow, you hear?

skins.shipDescription: Happy New Year, Commander. I've come to deliver you blessings for this coming year... Next, you're going to ask for a red envelope, right? Hehe, just teasing~
skins.acquisition: Happy New Year, Commander. I've come to deliver you blessings for this coming year... Next, you're going to ask for a red envelope, right? Hehe, just teasing~
skins.login: The warmth of spring often lulls many into oversleeping... But, Commander, it seems like you're accustomed to waking up early?
skins.details: Chao Ho thinks up the couplets, and I write them down. Don't you think we make a good team? Besides, seeing Chao Ho's brows furrow in thought is super cute... Anyway, let's think up some lines together later.
skins.secretaryIdle1: Miss Yat Sen, I'll help you prepare the food for tonight's reunion dinner. What about the fish? I'll start it up if you'd like.
skins.secretaryIdle2: I never thought I'd be able to enjoy the company of my sister and all our friends like this... Yes, it's all thanks to you, Commander.
skins.secretaryIdle3: Fu Shun, if you throw any more firecrackers into the pond... I'll change your seat to be right next to that lotus~?
skins.secretaryTouch: Since it's the Spring Festival, how about taking a break?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: The excitement of the festival seems to have gone to your head. Hehe~
